thread.title_full: Oprah Winfrey coming to Australia again: highlights from her first trip | Travel | Travel News and Holiday Deals | | The Advertiser

author: Sarah Blake
title: Oprah Winfrey coming to Australia again: highlights from her first trip | Travel | Travel News and Holiday Deals | |
text:
OPRAH packed more into her last whirlwind visit than most Aussies manage in a lifetime.
Here are some hand-picked highlights from her eight day tour.
Within hours of landing, Oprah joined celebrity chef Curtis Stone for a beach barbecue at The Great Barrier Reef.
More: How you can see Oprah in Australia again this year
Oprah's Ultimate Australian Adventure with chef Curtis Stone on Whitehaven Beach. Picture: Harpo Productions, Inc. Source: Supplied
Earlier, she headed to the Hamilton Island Wildlife Sanctuary for a close encounter with a koala — an experience she recalls clearly.
“I mean I had a koala bear in my arms when I had been in Australia for an hour, and I’m still trying to figure out where am I?” she said last week.
Oprah Winfrey cuddles koala Elvis at Hamilton Island Wildlife Park, after her aircraft touched down on Hamilton Island in the Whitsundays. Source: Supplied
Then it was off to Central Australia to experience Uluru.
“The beauty of the country and waking up in the middle of the desert was amazing, those were amazing experiences,” she said.
Oprah Winfrey at the sunset viewing area of Uluru, part of her 8-day visit to Australia. Source: News Limited
In Melbourne she was given a walking tour of the city by then Prime Minister Julia Gillard.
Oprah Winfrey interviews former prime minister Julia Gillard. Ms Gillard gave Oprah a gift of some Western Bulldogs merchandise. Source: News Limited
And thousands turned out to greet her in Federation Square.
Oprah Winfrey at Federation Square, Melbourne. Crowds of people gathered to catch a glimpse of Oprah. Source: News Limited
She had a crystal clear December day to experience the Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb.
Oprah Winfrey on top of the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Source: Supplied
And then it was time to join celebrity skipper Russell Crowe for a yacht race on Sydney Harbour.
“There was a regatta right there in front of the Sydney Opera House,” she said last week.
“I just actually looked at that tape and thought “Wow, that was one of the happiest days I ever spent.”
Oprah Winfrey poses with actor Russell Crowe while sailing on Sydney Harbour. Picture: AP Source: Supplied
